title: Requeme (Sebastes Kuhlii)
body: A gurnard fish that is caught at a depth ranging from 100 to 250 fathoms. In Câmara de Lobos, it is known by the name 'chapado', and in Porto Santo, by the name 'vermelho'. It is not a rare species and lives in rocky areas. Its flesh has a pleasant taste.

Câmara de Lobos: Where it is known by the name 'chapado'
Porto Santo: Where it is known by the name 'vermelho'
